dropzone.types: BMP, PNG, JPG, JPEG, TIF, TIFF, WebP or GIF

cpu.title: CPU & Memory Usage
cpu.medium_desc: Medium CPU & Memory cost, default process speed.
cpu.high_desc: High CPU & Memory cost, high process speed.
cpu.most_desc: Most CPU & Memory cost, faster process speed.

path.title: File Output Path
path.ask_me_desc: Output path will remain the same as the original file by default.

image.title: Image Settings
image.jpg_desc: Encoding parameter for JPG, JPEG images. Quality ranges from 1 to 100 inclusive, higher is better.
image.gif_desc: Maximum number of colors used in the GIF encoded image. NumColors ranges from 1 to 256 inclusive, higher is better.
image.png_desc: Default Compression, No Compression, Best Speed, Best Compression
image.exif_orientation_desc: If auto orientation is enabled, the image will be transformed after decoding according to the EXIF orientation tag (if present).
